oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: A description of the set of wood pieces (or |xu) used by the !kun for divining. This set of pieces is said to assent 'to me about the thing'. The set consist of four pieces â€“ two male and two female. The Makoba call the set |nu |num, although the boys say it is a 'Bushman institution'.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pieces of wood for divining, or |xu
